# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure.

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors with burner mining drill having no fuel
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has a sufficient fuel supply before starting the mining operation

### Errors with stone furnace having no fuel
- Ensure that the stone furnace has a sufficient fuel supply before starting the smelting operation

### Errors with burner inserter having no fuel
- Ensure that the burner inserter has a sufficient fuel supply before starting the insertion operation

### Errors with offshore pump not working
- Ensure that the offshore pump is properly placed and has a sufficient water supply

### Errors with boiler having no fuel
- Ensure that the boiler has a sufficient fuel supply before starting the steam generation operation

### Errors with steam engine not connected
- Ensure that the steam engine is properly connected to the boiler and the power grid

### Errors with pipe group being empty
- Ensure that the pipe group is properly connected to a fluid source

### Errors with electricity group not plugged into electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is properly connected to the power grid

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked by the agent.
